trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"> </xref> controle de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner>classe quando ele cria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controle ou uma cópia desse controle na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação para este designer.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner> object, adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> object to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object obtained from the base property, and then returns this collection.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActionLists cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner>de objeto, adiciona o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>do objeto para o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto obtido da propriedade base e, em seguida, retorna a esta coleção.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner"></xref> control allows resizing.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner"> </xref> permite o controle de redimensionamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control allows resizing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle permite redimensionamento; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of automatic format schemes that will be displayed in the **Auto Format** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de esquemas de formatação automática que será exibido no **AutoFormatação** caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection> object are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> class and are populated from internally defined XML-encoded constant strings.
trans-unit.target: Os elementos do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>objeto derivam de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>classe e são preenchidos a partir definidas internamente XML constantes cadeias de caracteres codificadas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> that contains the predefined schemes for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> que contém os esquemas predefinidos para a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method sets the mode of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, which can be a copy, to the current mode of the actual control.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeHtml define o modo de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controle, que pode ser uma cópia, para o modo atual do controle real.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: Next, it forces the child controls to be recreated, and then calls the base method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, ele força os controles filho a ser recriado e, em seguida, chama o método base para gerar a marcação.

trans-unit.source: If an error occurs, the GetDesignTimeHtml calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to generate the markup for a placeholder.
trans-unit.target: Se ocorrer um erro, as chamadas GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>método para gerar a marcação de um espaço reservado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>contendo a marcação usada para renderizar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"> </xref> em tempo de design.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é usada para renderizar o controle associado em tempo de design e preenche uma coleção de regiões de designer.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml> method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml>método para gerar a marcação para o processamento de tempo de design do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml>

trans-unit.source: It also adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> object to the `regions` parameter that describes the current view of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: Ele também adiciona uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>de objeto para o `regions` parâmetro que descreve a visão atual do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"></xref> to which a definition of the current view of the associated control has been added.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection"> </xref> para que uma definição da exibição atual do controle associado foi adicionada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>contendo a marcação usada para renderizar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"> </xref> em tempo de design.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the persisted form of the current template of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formulário persistente do modelo atual do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The GetEditableDesignerRegionContent method serializes the current template (the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control to its persisted form, which is a <xref:System.String> object of markup text.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEditableDesignerRegionContent serializa o modelo atual (a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>propriedade) da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>a seu formulário persistente, que é uma <xref:System.String>objeto de texto de marcação.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This persisted form consists of the serialized child controls appended together.
trans-unit.target: Este formulário persistente consiste em controles filho serializado acrescentados juntos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> that is not used by this GetEditableDesignerRegionContent override.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref> que é não usado por essa substituição é GetEditableDesignerRegionContent.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the persisted form of the current template of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o formulário persistente do modelo atual do associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that renders to a placeholder containing information about the error that occurred while attempting to create or render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que renderiza a um espaço reservado que contém informações sobre o erro que ocorreu ao tentar criar ou processar o controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The placeholder contains the type and control names, an error message, and the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property that is associated with the `e` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O espaço reservado contém os nomes de tipo e o controle, uma mensagem de erro e o <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>propriedade que está associada com o `e` parâmetro.</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception> that was thrown while creating or rendering the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Exception>que foi lançada ao criar ou processar o controle associado.</xref:System.Exception>

trans-unit.source: The markup for the placeholder that contains information about the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: A marcação do espaço reservado que contém informações sobre a exceção especificada.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: O host de designer chama o método Initialize quando ele estiver pronto para usar o designer para renderizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: The Initialize method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: O método Initialize e seus métodos base configurar propriedades e conectar eventos que são necessários para a operação do designer.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the control specified by `component`.
trans-unit.target: O `component` parâmetro é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controle associado este designer, ou uma cópia do controle especificado pelo `component`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>, which implements <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"> </xref>, que implementa <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Usado pelo designer para remover ou adicionar propriedades adicionais para exibição no **propriedades** grade ou a propriedades de sombra do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle usam métodos derivados de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método sombra várias propriedades de controle com as propriedades de tempo de design correspondentes que implementa o designer, e para adicionar ou remover propriedades do **propriedades** grade.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, the PreFilterProperties method sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> attribute to `false` for properties that do not apply to templates (removes them from the **Properties** grid) when a user template has been defined.
trans-unit.target: Para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controlar os conjuntos de método PreFilterProperties o <xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A>atributo `false` para propriedades que não se aplicam a modelos (remove-los do **propriedades** grade) quando um modelo de usuário foi definido.</xref:System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute.Browsable%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Implementando uma coleção de <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>das propriedades adicionadas e sombreadas.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner"></xref> control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner"> </xref> controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar regras de estilo CSS embutida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner> control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner>controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar a regra de estilo embutido na marcação.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ChangePasswordDesigner>

trans-unit.source: You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to true.
trans-unit.target: Você pode remover o contêiner de tabela externa definindo essa propriedade como true.

trans-unit.source: Removing the outer table gives you greater flexibility in how you apply CSS rules to the markup that is rendered by the control.
trans-unit.target: Remover tabela externa fornece maior flexibilidade em como aplicar as regras de CSS para a marcação que é processada pelo controle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle usa um contêiner de tabela externa para aplicar regras de estilo CSS embutida; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of a template of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor de um modelo do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The SetEditableDesignerRegionContent method sets an editable region in a designer to a control or template that is specified in its persisted form by the `content` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método SetEditableDesignerRegionContent define uma área editável em um designer para um controle ou um modelo que é especificado em sua forma persistente, o `content` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> to set content for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"> </xref> para definir o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a persisted control or template.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém um modelo ou controle persistente.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of template groups for the templates of the control that is associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de grupos de modelos para os modelos do controle que está associado este designer.

trans-unit.source: The TemplateGroups property constructs a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection> object and populates it with the collection returned by the base property.
trans-unit.target: As construções de propriedade TemplateGroups um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>do objeto e o preenche com a coleção retornada pela propriedade base.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection>

trans-unit.source: It then adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> object for each of the templates (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>) of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, adiciona um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>objeto para cada um dos modelos (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>) de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"></xref> containing an element for each template in the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroupCollection"> </xref> que contém um elemento para cada modelo associada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o designer deve usar uma cópia temporária em vez do controle real que está associado com o designer para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Because the UsePreviewControl property is always `true`, the designer uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control that contains a temporary copy of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Porque a propriedade UsePreviewControl é sempre `true`, o designer usa um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle que contém uma cópia temporária do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>controle para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control does not affect any persistence for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>controle não afeta qualquer persistência para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the UsePreviewControl property were overridden to return `false`, the designer would use the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> itself to generate the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade UsePreviewControl foi substituída para retornar `false`, o designer usaria associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>para gerar a marcação de tempo de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
